title: Identify APIs inside functions
content:

I'm using IDA and I want to know if there is a plugin to identify all called APIs inside a function instead of entering each function manually?

answers_data.content:
To have an overview of called API in a function you can use Graph feature without pluging : select function click on menu 
View > Graphs > Users xrefs chart...
in 
Starting Direction
check only 
Cross references from
in 
Ignore
group, check all except 
Externals

comments.text: Thanks for replying, I will try it

answers_data.content: Another way would be to dump the import table at runtime using ollydbg and load it into your ida using a script. I used to copy the data (address and function name) from ollydbg's import table and parse it into ida using a script I wrote. I can't quite find the script anymore though..
